concept.title: Boards
concept.shortdesc: A board is a place to collaborate around your marketing campaigns. You can create various boards to manage your assets (images and reports) and campaign cards, and share cards to other users' boards.

conbody.p: You can create a board to which you can pin cards. You can keep your board private or you can share it with other users to create a collaborative environment.
A board might be one you create for marketing reports and analytics. After you run a marketing report, you can share it to a Marketing Cloud board.
conbody.note: A First Time Experience board is available in the Marketing Cloud interface to help you understand feeds, cards, and boards.
